General.Name: Wing Tai Properties Limited
General.Description: Wing Tai Properties Limited, an investment holding company, engages in the investment, development, and management of properties in Hong Kong, the United Kingdom, the People's Republic of China, Singapore, and internationally. The company operates through Property Development, Property Investment and Management, Hospitality Investment and Management, and Others divisions. It develops and manages residential and commercial properties. The company's investment properties include commercial, industrial, residential units and serviced apartments, and hotel projects. It is also involved in the hospitality management, treasury investment, licensing, mortgage financing, and property agency activities. The company was formerly known as USI Holdings Limited and changed its name to Wing Tai Properties Limited in 2010. Wing Tai Properties Limited was incorporated in 1991 and is headquartered in Kwun Tong, Hong Kong.
General.Address: AIA Kowloon Tower, Kwun Tong, Hong Kong
